title: Lineage: Fate: Book 1
description: Three decades.For three decades, Michael has been on his own. Self-imposed exile - his only option - has been lonely. Necessary? Yes. Lonely? Absolutely.But tonight?Tonight everything changes.Up until tonight, Michael thought involuntarily becoming a vampire would be the wildest thing to ever happen to him. Nope.Not even close.
author: David Shockley
